sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均含"新的"之意。
means: new ： 普通用词，与old相对，指最近的或创新的。
fresh ： 指新鲜的、新做的，侧重创新。
novel ： 侧重新事物的新奇和独特。
innovative ： 强调富有创新和革新精神。

word_mean: dried products 水产品原料未经盐渍或漂烫等工艺处理，采用天然或人工方法直接干燥的产品。

sentence.Network_en: Fresh fruits and vegetables are important and so is bran.
sentence.Network_cn: 新鲜的水果和蔬菜很重要，麦麸也是。

sentence.Network_en: Grate a tablespoonful of fresh ginger into a pan.
sentence.Network_cn: 磨碎一汤匙鲜姜，放入平底锅。

sentence.Network_en: I tend to stick to fresh fruit for pudding.
sentence.Network_cn: 我一直坚持用新鲜水果做甜点。

jx.jx_en_mean: (informal)have just sold or run out of a supply of (something)

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English fersc 'not salt, fit for drinking', superseded in Middle English by forms from Old French freis, fresche; both ultimately of Germanic origin and related to Dutch vers and German frisch

encyclopedia.content: 品牌简介 品牌诞生地： 美国 品牌定位： 法国LVMH集团旗下的高端护肤品牌。 品牌特色及发展史 带有浓厚人文色彩的fresh相信，人类几百年的文化智慧是美颜的宝贵遗产，不需要改变，只需要改良。fresh把世界各地民族流传的古老美容秘方，结合现代人的喜好习惯，重新调配成适合日常使用的护肤系列。比如：玫瑰，红茶，大豆，澄糖等。 Fresh因独特的新旧融合，在业界自成一格，并反映在怀旧包装与恬静色彩中，渗透一份摩登的简约美学

entry.tran: 新的;替代的;另外的;外加的
entry.def: A fresh thing or amount replaces or is added to a previous thing or amount.

example.ex: He asked Strathclyde police, which carried out the original investigation, to make fresh inquiries...
example.tran: 他要求原来负责案子的斯特拉斯克莱德警方展开新一轮的调查。

example.ex: I need a new challenge and a fresh start somewhere else.
example.tran: 我需要一个新的挑战，换个地方重新开始。

entry.def: Something that is fresh has been done, made, or experienced recently.

example.ex: There were no fresh car tracks or footprints in the snow...
example.tran: 雪地里没有留下新的车辙或脚印。

example.ex: A puppy stepped in the fresh cement...
example.tran: 一只小狗踩在刚抹好的水泥面上。

entry.tran: (食物)新鲜的，非冷冻的,非罐装的
entry.def: Fresh food has been picked or produced recently, and has not been preserved, for example by being frozen or put in a tin.

example.ex: ...locally caught fresh fish.
example.tran: 当地捕到的鲜鱼

example.ex: ...fresh fruit.
example.tran: 新鲜水果

entry.tran: 新颖的;别致的;有独创性的
entry.def: If you describe something as fresh, you like it because it is new and exciting.

example.ex: These designers are full of fresh ideas.
example.tran: 这些设计师满脑子都是新创意。

example.ex: ...a fresh image.
example.tran: 新颖的意象

entry.def: If you describe something as fresh, you mean that it is pleasant, bright, and clean in appearance.

example.ex: Gingham fabrics always look fresh and pretty.
example.tran: 方格花布织物看上去总是鲜亮好看。

entry.def: If something smells, tastes, or feels fresh, it is clean or cool.

example.ex: The air was fresh and for a moment she felt revived.
example.tran: 空气清新，有那么一会儿她感到恢复了活力。

entry.def: Fresh water is water that is not salty, for example the water from rivers or lakes.

example.ex: Fresh water and other commodities are in short supply.
example.tran: 淡水和其他商品短缺。

entry.def: If you say that the weather is fresh, you mean that it is fairly cold and windy.

example.ex: It was a fine, fresh summer morning...
example.tran: 那是一个晴好而清寒的夏日早晨。

example.ex: Outside the breeze was fresh and from the north.
example.tran: 外面凉飕飕的微风从北面吹来。

entry.def: Fresh colours are clear, bright, and fairly light.

example.ex: ...a semi-circular mosaic, its startling colours still fresh.
example.tran: 令人惊叹的颜色依旧鲜艳的半圆形镶嵌画

entry.def: If someone has a fresh face or complexion, their skin looks healthy.

example.ex: His fresh complexion made him look younger than he was.
example.tran: 他的好气色令他看上去比实际年龄年轻。

entry.tran: 精神抖擞的;精力充沛的
entry.def: If you feel fresh, you feel full of energy and enthusiasm.

example.ex: It's vital we are as fresh as possible for those matches...
example.tran: 尽可能保持旺盛的精力参加那几场比赛对我们来说至关重要。

example.ex: I nearly always wake up fresh and rested.
example.tran: 我几乎每天醒来都精神抖擞，得到了充分休息。

entry.def: Fresh paint is not yet dry.
If you are fresh from a particular place or experience, you have just come from that place or you have just had that experience. You can also say that someone is fresh out of a place.

example.ex: I returned to the office, fresh from Heathrow...
example.tran: 我刚从希思罗机场回到办公室。

example.ex: Fresh from their semi-final win over Germany, Britain took a promising early lead...
example.tran: 刚刚在半决赛中战胜德国队的英国队开场便取得了领先，形势一片大好。

entry.tran: 刚用完…的;一点儿不剩的
entry.def: If you are fresh out of something, you have recently used the last of it and have none left.

example.ex: When I needed a tape to record an interview on I found I was fresh out of cassettes.
example.tran: 我想找一盘带子为访谈录音时发现磁带刚刚都用完了。

means.word_mean: 2. (of a cycle) beginning or occurring again;
4. of a kind not seen before;

sentences.sentence: "the computer produced a completely novel proof of a well-known theorem"

means.word_mean: 6. not containing or composed of salt water;
7. having recently calved and therefore able to give milk;

sentences.sentence: "impertinent of a child to lecture a grownup"
"an impudent boy given to insulting strangers"

example.en: I'm fresh out of coffee so you'll have to have tea.
example.zh: 我没有咖啡了，所以只好委屈你喝茶。

auth_sentence.content: Even to this day it sounds fresh and brave.
auth_sentence.res_content: Even to this day it sounds fresh and brave.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Even to this day it sounds fresh and brave.

auth_sentence.content: Serve fresh from the oven with butter and jam.
auth_sentence.res_content: Serve fresh from the oven with butter and jam.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Serve fresh from the oven with butter and jam.

auth_sentence.content: There was something pleasingly fresh about the campaign too.
auth_sentence.res_content: There was something pleasingly fresh about the campaign too.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There was something pleasingly fresh about the campaign too.

Sentence.sentence: It's good to get back to some fresh air.
They have a broader knowledge of nutrition, so they buy more fresh fruit and vegetables than ever before
Some restaurants go for custard made fresh with eggs, sugar and cream, but British custard is different, and we stay true to that.
Water Usage: Over the past century, human use of fresh water has increased at more than double the rate of population growth.

sentences.en: You can buy fresh fruit and vegetables in the market.
sentences.cn: 在这个市场你可以买到新鲜的水果和蔬菜。

sentences.en: This meat is not very fresh.

means.word_mean: 新的, 新到的, 新近的，新近出现的，新近体验的

sentences.en: A fresh man does nothing to the problem.
sentences.cn: 一个新手对这个问题的解决毫无帮助。

sentences.en: Please make me a fresh pot of tea.
This bread's fresh from the oven.

means.word_mean: 精神饱满的, 生气勃勃的

sentences.en: The old man looks as fresh as a young man.
sentences.cn: 这老年人看上去像年轻人一样生气勃勃。

means.word_mean: 另外的, 外加的; 重新的

sentences.en: When he came out of prison, he decided to make a fresh start.
sentences.cn: 他出狱后, 决心重新做人。

jushi.english: He didn't throw much fresh light on the subject.
jushi.chinese: 关于这个问题,他没有提供很多新的见解和资料。

jushi.english: I prefer swimming in fresh water to sea water.
jushi.chinese: 我愿在淡水里游泳,而不愿在海水里游泳。

jushi.english: Joan wears a fresh dress every time I see her.
jushi.chinese: 我每次看见琼,她都穿一件不同的衣服。
